```{r results='hold'}
f_mean = mean(female_students$IMC)
m_mean = mean(male_students$IMC)
t_mean = (f_mean+m_mean)/2
FvsM = stack(list(Female=female_students$IMC, Male=male_students$IMC))
t.test(FvsM$values, y = NULL,
       alternative = c("two.sided", "less", "greater"),
       mu = t_mean, paired = FALSE, var.equal = FALSE,
       conf.level = 0.95)
```
